```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(gisland)
```

What is on the menu?:

```{r}
read_lmi_features() %>% 
  select(-abstract) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

Lets get one itme:

```{r}
gl <- 
  read_lmi("LHG:grunnlina")
glimpse(gl)
# MULTICURVE is an odd geom, thus ...
gl <-
  gl %>% 
  sf::st_cast("MULTILINESTRING")
gl %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf()
```
